channel.title: Huge problem! help
channel.description: I played rpk-scape3 and then it kicked me off. Ever since then (about 1:00pm Est) everytime i try to log into ANY server it says Error connectint to server.Must be down. The only server i can play is comein.servegame.com i wanna play some other servers but it wotn let me. Someone please help me . and dont tell me "well the server is down or crashed" beacuse it even says that when i know the server is online.

shut^ ur the spammer. ur on like every thread[/quote]

He is, look what he just posted recently on someone else’s topic.
And most of his ‘help’, isn’t help at all.

Stop lag?

Tell the owner that his computer is a peice of shit or that he needs to restart. You choose.

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:1, topic:83557”][quote]igizzedi (1 day ago)
In 1932, a little girl named suzie was walking down the hall of an old hotel. A crazy man killed her by stabbing her in the back of the head and throwing her body in an elevator. As he closed the elevator doors he said the words “BAKUDA BAKUDA”. Now that you have read this message, her dead body will appear in your bedroom every night you go to bed. Unless you do this:

Retype this message on 3 other videos [/quote]

I lolled irl. It’s from YouTube. Also, sorry for spamming.[/quote]

Error connectint to server.Must be down.

item.title: Huge problem! help
item.dc:creator: @monsterboys monsterboys
item.description:
@monsterboys wrote:

Slave Scyth:

Let me ask you this: How do you know that the Server is up? You don’t know that, you can just assume. It’s most likely down. If you’re basing if the Servers up or not by the Server List then you need to know that that list can be very decieving.

because other people are telling me that they are playing on it while it wont let me on.

Read full topic
